languages.text: Таинственное технологическое устройство, сотворенное электрожрецами. В пассивном режиме оно улавливает любые дефекты в окружающей материи, а при активации генерирует импульс, форсирующий энтропийный распад этих нестабильных точек в тысячи раз.
languages.original_text: A mysterious piece of technology crafted by Electro-Priest artisans. While in passive mode, it senses every defect in the surrounding matter. When activated, it generates a pulse that accelerates the entropic decay of these unstable points by a factor of thousands.

traits.locale_text: Таинственное технологическое устройство, сотворенное электрожрецами. В пассивном режиме оно улавливает любые дефекты в окружающей материи, а при активации генерирует импульс, форсирующий энтропийный распад этих нестабильных точек в тысячи раз.

traits.locale_text: A mysterious piece of technology crafted by the Null Khalif data-engine. While in passive mode, it senses every defect in the surrounding matter. When activated, it generates a pulse that accelerates the entropic decay of these unstable points by a factor of thousands.

A mysterious piece of technology crafted by Electro-Priest artisans. While in passive mode, it senses every defect in the surrounding matter. When activated, it generates a pulse that accelerates the entropic decay of these unstable points by a factor of thousands.

languages.text: Una misteriosa tecnología creada por artesanos electrosacerdotes. En modo pasivo, detecta todos los defectos de la materia cercana. Al activarlo, genera un pulso que acelera el declive entrópico de esos puntos inestables a una velocidad miles de veces superior.
languages.original_text: A mysterious piece of technology crafted by Electro-Priest artisans. While in passive mode, it senses every defect in the surrounding matter. When activated, it generates a pulse that accelerates the entropic decay of these unstable points by a factor of thousands.

traits.locale_text: Una misteriosa tecnología creada por artesanos electrosacerdotes. En modo pasivo, detecta todos los defectos de la materia cercana. Al activarlo, genera un pulso que acelera el declive entrópico de esos puntos inestables a una velocidad miles de veces superior.

languages.text: Un mystérieux appareil conçu par des artisans électro-prêtres. En mode passif, il détecte tous les défauts présents dans la matière environnante. Une fois activé, il génère une pulsation qui accélère le processus de détérioration entropique de ces zones instables, le rendant des milliers de fois plus rapide.
languages.original_text: A mysterious piece of technology crafted by Electro-Priest artisans. While in passive mode, it senses every defect in the surrounding matter. When activated, it generates a pulse that accelerates the entropic decay of these unstable points by a factor of thousands.

traits.locale_text: Un mystérieux appareil conçu par des artisans électroprêtres. En mode passif, il détecte tous les défauts présents dans la matière environnante. Une fois activé, il génère une pulsation qui accélère le processus de détérioration entropique de ces zones instables, le rendant des milliers de fois plus rapide.

languages.text: 电僧工匠师精心打造的神秘科技造物。在被动模式下，它可以感知周围物质的每个缺陷。一旦启动，它将释放脉冲，使这些不稳定缺陷的熵衰减速度加快数千倍。
languages.original_text: A mysterious piece of technology crafted by Electro-Priest artisans. While in passive mode, it senses every defect in the surrounding matter. When activated, it generates a pulse that accelerates the entropic decay of these unstable points by a factor of thousands.

traits.locale_text: 驭电祭司工匠师精心打造的神秘科技造物。在被动模式下，它可以感知周围物质的每个缺陷。一旦启动，它将释放脉冲，使这些不稳定缺陷的熵衰减速度加快数千倍。

languages.text: エレクトロ・プリーストの職人によって作られた謎のテクノロジー。パッシブモードでは、周囲の物質のあらゆる瑕疵を感知する。起動するとパルスが発生し、不安定な点のエントロピー的崩壊を数千倍に加速する。
languages.original_text: A mysterious piece of technology crafted by Electro-Priest artisans. While in passive mode, it senses every defect in the surrounding matter. When activated, it generates a pulse that accelerates the entropic decay of these unstable points by a factor of thousands.

traits.locale_text: エレクトロ・プリーストの職人によって作られた謎のテクノロジー。パッシブモードでは、周囲の物質のあらゆる瑕疵を感知する。起動するとパルスが発生し、不安定な点のエントロピー的崩壊を数千倍に加速する。

languages.text: Eine mysteriöse Technologie, die von Elektropriestern gefertigt wurde. Im passiven Modus erkennt es jeden Defekt in der Materie in der Umgebung. Bei Aktivierung erzeugt das Gerät einen Puls, der den entropischen Zerfall dieser instabilen Punkte um einen Faktor im vierstelligen Bereich beschleunigt.
languages.original_text: A mysterious piece of technology crafted by Electro-Priest artisans. While in passive mode, it senses every defect in the surrounding matter. When activated, it generates a pulse that accelerates the entropic decay of these unstable points by a factor of thousands.

Bei Aktivierung erzeugt das Gerät einen Puls, der den entropischen Zerfall dieser instabilen Punkte um einen Faktor im vierstelligen Bereich beschleunigt.

languages.text: Elektro Rahip zanaatkârlarca imal edilmiş gizemli bir teknoloji parçası. Pasif moddayken çevresindeki maddenin her türlü kusuru algılar. Etkinleştirildiğinde bu kararsız noktaların entropik bozunmasını binlerce kat hızlandıran bir dalgalanma üretir.
languages.original_text: A mysterious piece of technology crafted by Electro-Priest artisans. While in passive mode, it senses every defect in the surrounding matter. When activated, it generates a pulse that accelerates the entropic decay of these unstable points by a factor of thousands.
